titleInfo.title: Donna the Buffalo at Walker Center

mods.abstract: Two color window card (green and split fountain, red to orange, on white) announcing Donna the Buffalo at the Walker Center at Wilkes Community College as part of the Americana Series on November 22. Poster features metal photoplates of a buffalo the the Hardee's logo.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
